text: 43|32|Sihamte tomara pratipalakara rahamata bhaga-bantana karae neki? Amihe parthira jiranata sihamtara majata sihamtara jiraika bantana karai di'om arau sihamtara ijanaka sijanara oparata maryadata unnita karai di'om yate ijane sijanaka adhinastha hicape grahana karaiba parae; (jani thoraa) sihamte yi sancaya karae, tomara pratipalakara rahamata tatokai utkrsta.
